name: Room 404 (itch)
description:
Oh no! Your good friend Joe is locked out of the house. You've got to get to the front door and open it for him. But, you are locked in your own room! How will you get out?

A short game made for the Brackeys 2022.1 GameJam

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E -  Pick Up

C (With Noki in Hand) - Call Joe

Q - Throw

Credits:

Nathan Doornbos (Nathan Doornbos - NHL Stenden Hogeschool - Winsum, Groningen, Nederland | LinkedIn) ~ 3D Artwork/Level Design/Game Design

Rients Schilstra ~ 2D Artwork/Game Design

Niels Zandberg ~ Programming/Level Design/Game Design

Hidde Zondervan ~ Game Design/Level Design/Joe
